Top Modern Decks
================



 Posted in [ARTICLES](/en/articles)
 on October 21, 2012 






![](https://media.magic.wizards.com/styles/auth_small/public/images/person/authorpic_EventCoverageStaff.jpg)
By Event Coverage Staff










Listed here are all players who earned 18 or more points in the 10 rounds of Modern Constructed play in the Swiss competition.


We apologize for the missing cards in many of these decks. In our urgency to post the lists after the Pro Tour, we didn't notice a technical error in our deck entry tool. As many decklists as possible have been corrected.
